title: Cho is still bullshit
body:
I dont't care what his win rate is at what ranks. 

The idea of a champions that is loaded with every type of CC, gets massively tanky while doing massive true damage is absurd, and its annoying in the game.

replies.body:
If only counters existed....
 {{champion:122}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:67}}{{champion:114}}

Ummmm I don't think you know what a counter is since only two are. If anything cho counters kayle, yi, and vayne since he can just press r. Like having true damage does mean there a fucking counter.

Like explain to why yi is a counter since he's not the majority of the time yi will fight cho will be in a team fight so he will have his r up and can very easily cc.

Coincidentally, I recently pressed R and Q on a Cho Gath as a 0 / 0 / 0 master yi top ( with conqueror ) and melted him like butter 
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3033944642/242976320?tab=overview

So a cho playing bad is your reason got it. Like no that is not how it works and I'm 90% sure he one doesn't play cho and two has no clue how items work like look at his build he basically just has the recommended items.

Yi is a tank shredder simple as that. 
He can dodge cho's knockup with his q
And there is not a scenario where cho wins yi in a 1v1... unless that yi is terrible

At no point of the game can cho just 1shot with his R, so he has lots of counterplay.

Ummmmmm are you trolling? In what fucking world is a cho 1v1ing a yi, like again the majority of the time yi will only fight cho in a team fight. Like why are you being disingenuous TANKS DON'T WIN 1V1S there are very few tanks that can actually 1v1 anyone soo why are you cho in a unrealistic scenario??

Like yi late game will take around 4s to kill a cho and in a team fight that is a long time. Like yi will most likely use he q as a gap close or to dodge other cc and cho also has a silence meaning it stops yi from having any chance of using q to dodge since in a team fight there are more then just cho cc.


Cho's r will do a least health of yi's hp and yi doesn't have a lot sooo yeah it hurts him.

Like a counter is something that stops a champion from doing there job yi doesn't do that and it's basically the same for all but 2 of the champions listed.

I'm just gonna stop talking to you because you are really just not getting my point and this thread has gotten severely toxic thanks to the OP.
Cya and have a nice day.
Enjoy your -8 post

> [{quoted}](name=JuiceBoxP,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:21:28.547+0000)
>
> If only counters existed....
>  {{champion:122}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:67}}{{champion:114}}

{{champion:122}} Sucks outside of Lane
{{champion:10}} is overloaded after all but in fact he is a good pick against her in late game
{{champion:11}} is a Tank shredder and is much easier to outplay and actually sucks in fights where Cho is at his strongest
{{champion:114}} Same is Yi case
{{champion:67}} Top is only good in lane
Picking her while preventing your team from having a real Top laner

Not saying Cho is OP but you mentioned some Extremely bad examples.

the examples dont matter. the point is cho isnt the end all be all and cant be beaten or countered. 

the op is crying cuz he/his team didnt know how to be a slow moving champ who has a very telegraphed Q which is a skill shot and a small aoe silence for cc and got to close to cho so all cho had to do was press R to do damage.
( please remove vayne from top lane counter suggestions ty )

> [{quoted}](name=JuiceBoxP,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:21:28.547+0000)
>
> If only counters existed....
>  {{champion:122}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:67}}{{champion:114}}

Is Kayle actually a counter to Cho?
She deals massive amounts of true damage late game..

> [{quoted}](name=JuiceBoxP,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:21:28.547+0000)
>
> If only counters existed....
>  {{champion:122}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:67}}{{champion:114}}

Wow, if only things existed in a vaccum and their your post might be releavant. You cant always counter pick, and even if you do, you can't control your teammates playing wrong against the fed cho. . Also, those dont counter him at all. He will once shot most of them later on.

Wow you can't ever control your teammates, Wow.

Also, you don't need a vacum to counter cho. You just need a champion that deals huge amounts of true damage like the champions above.

If your team is shit you would lose anyway

> [{quoted}](name=JuiceBoxP,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:49:52.280+0000)
>
> Wow you can't ever control your teammates, Wow.
> 
> Also, you don't need a vacum to counter cho. You just need a champion that deals huge amounts of true damage like the champions above.
> 
> If your team is shit you would lose anyway

You dont have a point. You can say that about any champion. That doesnt mean some arent too strong or broken. You argument is invalid and awful. Go away

Im not toxic just because I pointed out that what you said was useless. But if makes you feel better to call someone toxic who put you in your place, then fine. Im toxic. Goodbye

> [{quoted}](name=DarkinPrime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:47:27.363+0000)
>
> Wow, if only things existed in a vaccum and their your post might be releavant. You cant always counter pick, and even if you do, you can't control your teammates playing wrong against the fed cho. . Also, those dont counter him at all. He will once shot most of them later on.

You're out of your mind if you think Cho'gath is fucking with a Master Yi, Vayne, or Fiora late game.

Darius maybe, and Kayle in a duel possibly, but she will shred his fat ass in team fights.

just a fyi about cho's damage here is a break down of his damage on average per game and how it ranks with all other champs in the game

Physical Damage:  2,183
 83 / 143 
Magic Damage:  11,136
 51 / 143 
True Damage:  3,492
 7 / 143 
Total Damage:  16,812
 80 / 143

so as you can see he does about 16.8k damage per game which is ranked 80th out 143 champs 
his true damage is over all 7th out 143 champs but with his over all damage low he actually puts out a low-moderate amount of damage. 

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/9.9/platinum/plus/champion/Chogath/

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-05T20:53:27.996+0000)
>

>  83 / 143

>  7 / 143

>  80 / 143

> so as you can see he does about 16.8k damage per game which is ranked 80th out 143 champs

And? That chart doesnt talk about how many seconds of cc he does ,and how much damage he absorbs.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkinPrime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-05-06T00:39:46.857+0000)
>
> And? That chart doesnt talk about how many seconds of cc he does ,and how much damage he absorbs.

you were bitching that he does damage while having cc . i pointed out the damage to disprove you.

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-05-06T00:44:27.547+0000)
>
> you were bitching that he does damage while having cc . i pointed out the damage to disprove you.

I bitched about damage, CC and tankiness as a whole.  You cant parse out one piece and say my point isnt valid, especially when the damage cho does to champions, even though it might look low at the end of the match, is significant when he secures easy kills.

Numbers don't tell the full story.
There is a thing called "mobility" in this game. The champion in question has NONE of that..

> [{quoted}](name=Ilovemobas,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KMG6qshE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-06T11:54:10.636+0000)
>
> There is a thing called "mobility" in this game. The champion in question has NONE of that..

There are many champions who lack mobility, and dont have half the CC tankiness or damage of Cho

Cho can get kited to oblivion, as long as your not in the dead center of his Q it's dodgeable. Also, I looked at your OP.GG and yes you lost to a cho in one game. Cho is fine, he has an exectute so what? He has to kill you to get tanky, beat him in fights pre 6 and he'll never recover.

Yeah I've been playing some cho recently. It's super fun. People forget how much damage your ult does so they might be kinda low so they try to farm under tower then you just walk up and hit them once with your e and eat them lol
